numbered_ace_sentences: 2. I notice that wealthy students are more likely to get into a college.
4. I notice that students with a legacy have a much higher chance of getting into a college.
5. This situation is unfair for some students.
6. Some students try to be the first person in their family to attend a college.
7. I wonder why students whose parents have a higher income are more likely to be admitted into these colleges.
8. In our community, many people try to be the first person in their family to attend a college.
9. This graph shows that these people are much less likely to get into a good college.
10. The headline is: The rigged college admission system.
